page.title: 07COMMUNITY POLICE
page.content: In 1983 a{Rural Beat Officer}was selected with specific responsibilities for individual parishes. The Officer covering{Middle {Rasens}primary responsibilities revolve around community relations. Other Officers in{Incident Response {Vehicles}attend more urgent matters. Due to financial restraints the area covered by each Rural Beat Officer has been enlarged.The police man now has the following villages for which he is the 'Village Bobby':- Market Rasen, Middle Rasen, Tealby, Walesby, Legsby, Kirkby - cum- Osgodby, North Owersby, Thornton - le- Moor, Claxby, Normanby-le-Wold and North Willingham.
